text: I sure hope #COVID19 #vaccine for all teachers and staff in Jan 2021 is on the table and that @SFUSD_Supe, @LondonBreed, and @CAgovernor @GavinNewsom are doing everything they can to make that happen so we can reopen our schools. My kid needs in-person schooling. #PrioritizeKids https://t.co/IMpRiMhZEk
